mapper.select: SELECT rl.*, r.title, r.content, r.writer, r.viewCnt, r.createdDate, u.name, u.nickname, u.role, u.position, u.phoneNumber, u.img, u.orgimg FROM RLikes rl JOIN reviews r ON rl.reviewSeq = r.reviewSeq JOIN users u ON rl.userSeq = u.userSeq WHERE rl.userSeq = #{userSeq}, rl.reviewSeq = #{reviewSeq}
SELECT * FROM Reviews vr JOIN RLikes vrl ON vr.reviewSeq = vrl.reviewSeq WHERE vrl.userSeq = #{userSeq}
SELECT * FROM Users u JOIN RLikes vrl ON u.userSeq = vrl.userSeq WHERE vrl.reviewSeq = #{reviewSeq}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM RLikes WHERE userSeq = #{userSeq} AND reviewSeq = #{reviewSeq}
